item.title: About
item.description:
Hi, I’m Ana. Currently a grad student studying Cybersecurity @ NYU Tandon… whilst wrapping up a CS degree @ Merrimack College. This is my attempt to keep track of my coursework as I rate and review every online Master’s course I’ve taken.

Spring 2026, NYU Tandon Information, Security & Privacy. Great introductory course, excited to write research paper

Spring 2026, NYU Tandon Computer Networking. Good, lots of memorization. Exam-heavy
